radar: Viktor Hovland tees off Thursday at Pebble Beach, one of golf's most storied venues on the PGA Tour calendar. Casper Ruud's ATP schedule resumes later this month with hard court swing approaching Indian Wells. Magnus Carlsen's classical chess calendar remains light until the Candidates Tournament qualifying window opens in spring.
